content.heroIntro:
Welcome to EDIFICIO RODAS PLAYA, a prestigious residential development by CBH HOMES located in the coveted Playa de El Cura area of Torrevieja, Alicante. This exceptional project offers a carefully curated selection of 3 stunning properties, including modern apartments, luxurious penthouses, and charming bungalows, all designed to provide the ultimate Mediterranean lifestyle. With prices starting from just €265,000 and delivery scheduled for March 2027, EDIFICIO RODAS PLAYA represents an outstanding investment opportunity in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal destinations.

CBH HOMES has built a stellar reputation for delivering high-quality residential properties that seamlessly blend contemporary design with practical functionality. Each unit at EDIFICIO RODAS PLAYA features 2 bedrooms, 1-2 bathrooms, and spacious layouts ranging from 69 to 86 square meters, perfect for families, couples, and investors seeking a second home or rental property. The development benefits from its prime location in Playa de El Cura, offering direct access to pristine beaches, world-class amenities, and the vibrant expat community that has made Torrevieja one of Europe's most welcoming destinations.

Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, a holiday retreat, or a smart investment, EDIFICIO RODAS PLAYA delivers exceptional value and lifestyle benefits. The property prices represent approximately 45% savings compared to Costa Blanca North developments, while the market demonstrates impressive +8% year-on-year growth. With communal facilities, modern construction standards, and the security of CBH HOMES' proven track record, this is your opportunity to own a piece of the Costa Blanca dream.

locationSection.intro: Playa de El Cura is one of Torrevieja's most desirable residential neighborhoods, renowned for its authentic Spanish charm combined with modern international amenities. This thriving coastal community sits at the heart of the largest expat community in Spain, where English is widely spoken and diverse cultures create a welcoming, cosmopolitan atmosphere. The area is characterized by excellent infrastructure, outstanding healthcare facilities including the 24-hour Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja, and proximity to the famous Playa del Cura—a pristine Blue Flag beach perfect for swimming and water sports. Beyond the beaches, Playa de El Cura offers convenient access to quality shopping at Mercadona, Carrefour, and local markets, alongside an impressive array of restaurants ranging from traditional Spanish tapas bars to international cuisines. Golf enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity to Villamartín Golf Club just 15 minutes away, while nature lovers can explore the golden sands of La Mata beach just 6 kilometers away. The neighborhood perfectly balances beach lifestyle with urban convenience, making it ideal for families, retirees, and professionals seeking the authentic Costa Blanca experience.
